website_summaries.verdict: The invisibleSHIELD HD protection is a good choice to provide protection and clarity for your tablet.
pros: Covers the corners of your iPad Improved grip make this screen protector drop-resistant
A lifetime warranty provides ease of mind

customer_reviews.title: Never discontinue this!!
customer_reviews.text: I've used this for over a year now and LOVE it. It's like glass. Not exactly smudge proof but wiped clean easily (like glass). As for high def, I've never noticed any quality of my screen being diminished. I forget it's even on there. The application wasn't too hard-- watch YouTube videos first to be sure you've got it-- and it's perfect. No bubbles. My favorite thing is the self healing aspect. Wow! So cool to make a nick or scratch and then hours later it's gone. I would buy this again and again! The only thing I will ever put on my iPads!
customer_reviews.author: Anix

customer_reviews.title: Easy to apply
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. The wet apply allows flexibility in adjusting the position. Great screen protector.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Petersen

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. Easy to install and although it seemed really thick, my iPad Air seems just as sensitive as if there wasn't a cover on it. Once it dries, it is very clear and you don't really notice it. I did end up having some issues with it, more related to what I wanted to do with my iPad and the Zagg customer service people did a great job of helping me out.
customer_reviews.author: Dean T

customer_reviews.title: Best one around!
customer_reviews.text: Followed the directions word for word. Applied it and was a bit concerned with the amount of air bubbles that remained, even after heating it a bit. Low and Behold, just as the directions say, they all worked their way out over the course of the next couple days. Very pleased with this particular model. Can hardly tell something is applied to the screen unless you look for it in the corners!
customer_reviews.author: E. Payne

customer_reviews.title: ... for almost a year and it is still a great product. Zagg has some great products
customer_reviews.text: I have had this for almost a year and it is still a great product. Zagg has some great products, but the Invisible Shield line is a much higher quality product than the original. Zagg replacement guarantee is easy and quick, just remember to return the old product in their prepaid return envelope. Highly recommend for all devices.
customer_reviews.author: citydweller

customer_reviews.title: Don't like it at all
customer_reviews.text: Put it on without a problem, BUT the edges extend beyond the ipad so the stickyness on the extension becomes a problem and it extension begins to bend completely out of shape when you have it on a cover and when you turn it around to use it. It was a absolute pain so I only used it for a very short time, took it off and do not use it at all. Should not have bought it...a waste of $$$.
customer_reviews.author: JLA

customer_reviews.title: Excellent screen cover
customer_reviews.text: I love the zagg covers. I have used on several phones and 3 iPads. Really protect the screen well. They are pretty easy to install if you make sure to wet your fingers well, the cover and the screen. Apply from one edge and lay down across the device. Use the squeegee to move air bubbles from middle of screen outward towards the edges. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: TT in MA

customer_reviews.title: Tricky Installation, but very clear
customer_reviews.text: Works well on my Ipad air. I personally installed. The trick is to remove the clear film on the "outside" of the protector (the part you are going to be touching when using the device) before you remove the back layer and expose the more adhesive part of the shield to apply directly to the device. Make sure your fingers and the device is covered thoroughly. Use light pressure to apply in the center, then work your way to the edges. Let your device dry and wipe any excess fluid away for 1 minute before use and you should be good to go.
customer_reviews.author: Doug

customer_reviews.title: This product works great and I love the Zagg company
customer_reviews.text: This product works great and I love the Zagg company. Their products are always reliable and I know I will get my money's worth when I buy from them.
customer_reviews.author: Levi

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST
customer_reviews.text: Been using Zagg shields after a reccomendation from a co-worker and would never use anything else. I had my iPhone for 3 years, never had to replace the shield and after my husband dropped my phone quite hard, there was a small crack but the shield held and I was still able to use the phone. Well worth the money and guaranteed for life!
customer_reviews.author: VickiAnne

customer_reviews.title: Another Success for ZAGG
customer_reviews.text: Just purchased an iPad Air and wanted to protect the screen. I have an iPhone 4 with a ZAGG screen protector and it works very well. I like the lifetime (free replacement) warranty with the ZAGG products along with the quality. The application instructions were simple and straight forward. Great Product!
customer_reviews.author: William Tellam

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have used invisibleshield for all of my apple products and they work amazingly! They create a very strong durable coating that stands up to spills or drops. I use it for my ipad and all of my iphones (I've got the 6 + on order) and I will use it for that phone too when I get it.
customer_reviews.author: Nanette

customer_reviews.title: I love this shield
customer_reviews.text: I love this shield. Came with perfect application tools. I feel my ipad is really protected...but don't even know its on. Hint: when you first put it on, there may still be a few bubbles. Just LEAVE them alone! They will disappear...probably within 48 hours. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Molly

customer_reviews.title: Awesome  screen protection
customer_reviews.text: This screen protector is by far the best screen protector in the industry. Easy installation . Looks and feels great to the touch. Ultra sensitive to touch so the functions on your screen are exact. I would highly recommend this to anyone I if they want to keep their iPad's screen completely scratch free.
customer_reviews.author: Rob C. Southampton

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! I had someone that had applied several of these screens before apply mine and it looked easy if you knew what to do - but I would have never attempted it on a first try - so make sure you watch youtube videos or read the instructions thoroughly before applying.
customer_reviews.author: Georgia

customer_reviews.title: Bubbles go away....just be patient
customer_reviews.text: Like other reviews, I had trouble with the bubbles at first, but within a few days they were all completely gone. Now it looks like I don't even have a shield on my screen. I have no complaints - other than the glare - but I knew that when I got it that I either had to buy one with a matte finish (and lose clarity) or get this one.
customer_reviews.author: Janet

customer_reviews.title: FLAWLESS...
customer_reviews.text: I have read a few of these reviews and really can't figure out how people are having issues with putting these covers on!!! pretty easy to apply you just have to read the instructions!!! I have Zagg protectors on all of my devices...I Pad, I pod, Cell phone's ...Awesome product!!!
customer_reviews.author: shawn williams

customer_reviews.title: Zagg makes great products
customer_reviews.text: Clear screen protection for your device. This is the best screen protector I've had and worth every penny! Be sure to check out the many youTube videos on HOW to install before you even open the package. Very easy install, just follow the directions before you start!
customer_reviews.author: Books by the Cup

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great protection for the Ipad Air, i would recommend it to anyone
customer_reviews.author: Alexv77084

customer_reviews.title: Shield is awesome
customer_reviews.text: Have always used Zagg Shields got this for wife's ipad air I am now a official zagg shield installer Looks great no impeding visual effects this is the way to go especially with the new screen and resolution
customer_reviews.author: Q

customer_reviews.title: Great screen protector
customer_reviews.text: This is a great iPad screen protector. At first I thought it was terrible, but after about a week all the air bubbles and moisture under the screen disappeared. Very clear and great protection for a goo price compared to retail.
customer_reviews.author: Graham Kern

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to install and not evident at first glance it is on the iPad. Fits the new iPad air, which I installed it on.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Ann

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: This product was a little messy to install. Once it was installed there were small bubbles left after I used the squeegee provided. Instructions said these would disappear after a couple of days. That happened. It is very clear--you can't tell it is on the screen..
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Love Zagg Protectors
customer_reviews.text: You have to love the Zagg shields. Fairly easy to put on. Looks great and lifetime warranty!!! Pay only shipping cost. Will never buy another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Kris10

customer_reviews.title: InvisableShield High Def for Apple IPad
customer_reviews.text: This is an easy shield to apply and I have one for both iPads and both iPhones. I haven't had any problems with any tearing.
customer_reviews.author: C Stanley

customer_reviews.title: Great Shield
customer_reviews.text: Great Shield for My iPad Air and Crystal Clear in HD. I will recommend this to anyone in the market looking for a great shield to protect their tablet.
customer_reviews.author: Dark Gable

customer_reviews.title: Have Someone Who Knows What They're Doing Apply This!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this shield for someone else to put on their iPad. Twice. The first one they became frustrated with putting it on, and crumpled up the shield and threw it into the trash. The second one they tried to apply 5 different times - and me once - before finally lowering their expectations and leaving it be - annoying bubbles and all. I'm sure that someone who knows what they're doing could apply the shield easily and with no bubbles left between it and the iPad screen (Hey! I've watched the videos on YouTube!), but apparently neither my buddy nor I can. The shield does protect the screen well, but pay to have someone else apply it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Previous one is 4 years old without a scratch! We were happy to shell out for a new one for our additional iPad. These are expensive, but that's a first world problem...
customer_reviews.author: Alex Winston

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: fits like a charm and i always trust invisible shield
customer_reviews.author: Shooker

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Amazing not a single scratch on my iPad in over a year
customer_reviews.author: Tandy Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Shields iDevices from scratches. Great investment to protect screen. Have been using them for years and love their lifetime guarantee exchanges!
customer_reviews.author: Drea585

customer_reviews.title: These are terrible. Wet Apply isn't the way to go
customer_reviews.text: These are terrible. Wet Apply isn't the way to go. Get glass or the shield that Staples sells and applies.
customer_reviews.author: Matwood

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT, LOVE IT!!
customer_reviews.text: ALWAYS LOVE INVISIBLE SHIELD, EASY TO PUT ON AND YOU DON'T REALIZE THAT THERE IS A PROTECTIVE SHEET ON THE IPAD
customer_reviews.author: Mitzi

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I have had this shield before for another IPAD. Was great - came timely Definitely recommend the InvisibleSHIELD for any IPad
customer_reviews.author: M2J

customer_reviews.title: Hopefully the bubbles go away...
customer_reviews.text: This is the first time I have spent the extra money on a name brand screen protector for any of my devices. I am happy with the quality of the material of the screen protector, but the installation was more difficult that i expected. I watched a few videos on how to install before my attempt. The screen was slightly cloudy after installation and there was a few sizes of bubbles on the screen. Most of these have cleared up except for about two dozen small bubbles. I am hopeful that the remaining bubbles will continue to clear up as the directions indicated.
customer_reviews.author: Greg A

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Went on smoothly - with a little bit or effort with the squeegee I achieved success with no bubbles
customer_reviews.author: SRiches

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This was as easy to install as written. Good quality product.
customer_reviews.author: marley

customer_reviews.title: ZAGG fan!!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE ZAGG products. I will never use anything else to protect my electronics.
customer_reviews.author: Nana D

customer_reviews.title: It's obviously an art and I'm not good at it
customer_reviews.text: I had problems installing the protective shield. It's obviously an art and I'm not good at it. I'm in the process of sending it back for a replacement to try again.
customer_reviews.author: Edwin

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product.
customer_reviews.text: I'm no expert. Cleaned, sprayed, applied, squeegeed. It will take two days for the minuscule air bubbles to disappear.
customer_reviews.author: james

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend this product
customer_reviews.text: I am a very big fan of Zagg screen protectors. After putting this on my iPad air 2 the touch screen function did not work well, but after the next day when the screen protector completely flattened to the iPad , the touch screen function worked perfectly. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Maria B

customer_reviews.title: ZAGG is great
customer_reviews.text: If you have ever used any of the ZAGG products before, then you know exactly what to expect here. The products aork as described, and the company is great with support.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Oliver

customer_reviews.title: Best ever!
customer_reviews.text: Zagg protector has proven to be the best for apple products. I have tried other protectors for both ipad and iPhone but in both the cases I was forced to order zagg right away. Its application effort is minimal. The air bubbles miraculously smooth out in a couple of days. Though the product is more expensive than others it is worth your bucks!
customer_reviews.author: sba

customer_reviews.title: but after watching the recommended video it was so easy
customer_reviews.text: I was a little anxious about applying this shield to my tablet myself because I had never done it before, but after watching the recommended video it was so easy!
customer_reviews.author: Vickie

customer_reviews.title: Stands up to lots
customer_reviews.text: This particular screen protector is not really easy to get "settled" but works very well in protection of the screen. It is worth the effort!
customer_reviews.author: Lulu

customer_reviews.title: Really like the Zagg protectors
customer_reviews.text: This is the third Zagg protector I have bought for my various devices, a phone, a Kindle Fire HD and now an iPad Air. Highly durable, easy to maintain and really like the protection for my screens. The only drawback to the Zagg is the wet application. It can be a bit tedious and I find I have to reapply at least once. Overall a good return on my investments.
customer_reviews.author: ksamules

customer_reviews.title: Difficult installation
customer_reviews.text: Pleased with the product but it took longer to install than I thought it would.
customer_reviews.author: Surhance

customer_reviews.title: Clear as a bell
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use; looks very nice and the clarity is supreme. We let it dry for a full 24 hours and no additional bubbles appeared.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: The quality was equal to the store brought and less than 1/2 the price. Has the same money back grantee with Zagg.
customer_reviews.author: Dianna

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: This would be 5 start if I could ever get them to stick on all corners.
customer_reviews.author: David Crifasi

customer_reviews.title: Dont let the wet apply deter you!
customer_reviews.text: I can't even tell it is on my ipad. I was a little intimidated by the 'wet apply' but it is actually easier than the pre adhesive type because you can manipulate the cover until it is exactly where you want it. It does take about a day for the haze to clear up but once it does, it is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Robyn M. Schlagheck

customer_reviews.title: Zagg
customer_reviews.text: This is the best screen protector for the iPad Air. It is easy to install and provides great protection for the retina display screen!
customer_reviews.author: Jim Jensen

customer_reviews.title: Make sure your cat/dog is nowhere around when applying
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product but application can be tricky. The use of "wetter" agent is counter-intuitive on expensive electronics. Instructions are not that good but YouTube videos helped. The tragedy was that as I holding the exposed film and was applying to my iPad my cat decided to get friendly (beg for food) and brushed by leaving several hairs that became entrapped. I kept going and yep, captured a few hairs. So, use lots of wetting agent and don't worry about what looks like bubbles. They disappear almost magically.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Scooterman

customer_reviews.title: Zagg Ipad shield
customer_reviews.text: Once it saws on for a while all the bubbles and imperfections worked their way out. Did find it a little difficult to separate the front and backing to get to the shield. This also made it a little confusing as to which side was which.
customer_reviews.author: R. Pergament

customer_reviews.title: Great protector
customer_reviews.text: Awesome cover , great if not best price ever,flawless and easy to put on will recommend and will buy again
customer_reviews.author: Ivan Montano

customer_reviews.title: Fingerprints!
customer_reviews.text: The description said fingerprint resistant. NOT!! Also wondering if it is a knockoff product. Box is different from what you buy in the store. Since the price is so much less, I would buy the original.
customer_reviews.author: catgirl

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: To won't purchase anything but these screen protectors for my electronics.
customer_reviews.author: Roscoe23

customer_reviews.title: Zagg shield
customer_reviews.text: Took a few days for the bubbles to come out after applying, but once they did the screen was nice and clear. Just follow the directions and be patient regarding the bubbles and it will turn out. Love zagg products.
customer_reviews.author: Marg

customer_reviews.title: Why don't people like ZAGG anymore?
customer_reviews.text: I don't understand why people don't like ZAGG anymore. I have tried a number of best selling screen guards on Amazon, and I can promise you, Zagg is the best. May be the costliest but the best indeed.
customer_reviews.author: rahul

customer_reviews.title: which is excellent.
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't get the InvisibleShield to install properly on my iPad Air; there were some blemishes that I found distracting. I discarded the InvisibleShield and purchased/installed a TechPro Premium ShatterProof Crystalline screen protector, which is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Ochs

customer_reviews.title: I would have returned this if I could. I ...
customer_reviews.text: I would have returned this if I could. I had to apply and reapply so many times because of the bubbles that by the time I got it right there where now fibers and dust stuck underneath.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina G.

customer_reviews.title: Don't Bother
customer_reviews.text: What a major pain in the butt. It shouldn't be this hard to affix a shield, no matter what.
customer_reviews.author: HannahD

customer_reviews.title: Hard
customer_reviews.text: The screen protector was terrible with bubbles and was very hard to apply! But if you take your time and find a way to get all bubbles out you will be pleased
customer_reviews.author: James B

customer_reviews.title: Only got half of what I ordered.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 shields for the iPad air and received 1 for the IPad and one for the MS surface. I was assured buy the seller the other IPad shield would be shipped. I haven't heard a thing since. I will not buy from this location again.
customer_reviews.author: mark

customer_reviews.title: Awesome protection and durability
customer_reviews.text: This is the second Zagg screen protector that I have owned. They remain clear and endure all of the abuse I have given them. I have had one on my old I-pad for two years.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth A. Fairbanks

customer_reviews.title: Best Screen protector ever!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to apply (the key is wetting your fingers and the iPad screen thoroughly). Once the film dries and "heals" in 12-24 hours it is virtually undetectable and it actually adds some nice tack to the screen itself.
customer_reviews.author: Tim C from Long Island

customer_reviews.title: Hard to apply
customer_reviews.text: I have decided that from now on I will only use dry applications for screen protector. This was very hard to work with and I ended up taking it off.
customer_reviews.author: M. Griffis

customer_reviews.title: I wouldn't recommend the Wet Apply InvisibleShield at all
customer_reviews.text: I messed up big time with this shield.... I wouldn't recommend the Wet Apply InvisibleShield at all.
customer_reviews.author: Starr

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: I love this product, but I must have purchased some used ones for next to nothing. None of them worked. One actually had been removed from the shipping screen and replaced without aligning it. It was not even usable.
customer_reviews.author: John Craighill

customer_reviews.title: My Thoughts on the Shield
customer_reviews.text: Well, the truths is that it is more work than its worth to put it nicely but it has its use
customer_reviews.author: Richard Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Huge potential, terrible installation.
customer_reviews.text: Great protection for your retina display but it is an effing nightmare to install! Only for the bold, good luck.
customer_reviews.author: MARCOS

customer_reviews.title: I blew it. Bad sample of the product.
customer_reviews.text: Well, I blew it. I missed the return date. I watched the videos on how to apply this item. I did all the preparation. I was very excited. And one of the protective covers would NOT come off of the shield. In the video the protective covers pull off easily. One cover did. The second cover did not. So I cannot use it. I lose my $. I should have returned it and I was too late. Bummer. What a waste. Please forgive my complaining...
customer_reviews.author: T. P. Sterling

customer_reviews.title: Very few Bubbles left.
customer_reviews.text: 5 bubbles left on the edges after 3 weeks of waiting for a totally smooth surface.
customer_reviews.author: Erin E Lee

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to remove from plastic sheet it was affixed to.
customer_reviews.text: It was difficult to remove from the plastic sheet. When I used the tab to pull the protector off of the sheet, the plastic ripped and then I almost could not remove the rest of the plastic sheet
customer_reviews.author: louise s

customer_reviews.title: Item is defective
customer_reviews.text: The Zagg HD iPad Air screen protector I ordered isn't cut correctly, the front facing microphone is covered. I have another Zagg HD iPad Air protector ordered directly from Zagg which doesn't have this issue. This item was ordered for the second iPad Air in our family due to the cost. This item is cut smaller than the real iPad Air screen protector. So far it hasn't been worth the reduced price. Processing time was extremely slow too. Item was ordered on Dec 28 and didn't start transit until Jan 2. Unacceptable. I will update this review once the seller responds to my request for a replacement with free shipping.
customer_reviews.author: D. Eng

customer_reviews.title: awfull
customer_reviews.text: I should have know from the price, doubt it is real Zagg product, peeling it from cover sheet to install left creases that could not be smoothed out, had to toss it in trash. I have used Zagg products for many years, 2 phones, old iPad, Fire, never had a problem before.
customer_reviews.author: JJ_Flash

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The first one curled into itself. More likely user error.
customer_reviews.author: Aimee156

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works fine, not easy to put it on without getting a crinkle.
customer_reviews.author: Mike R

customer_reviews.title: Works good self healing
customer_reviews.text: Worth the money? Time will tell. Easy install and great self healing effect. Doesn't seem to effect the sensitivity on the screen
customer_reviews.author: RRussell

customer_reviews.title: fitting issue
customer_reviews.text: The cut out for the camera and sensor dont match at all, and I know I install all side correctly
customer_reviews.author: y2kai

customer_reviews.title: This is an outstanding product
customer_reviews.text: Easy to apply. Just follow the directions. Do not worry about the air bubbles. They all disappear after several days.
customer_reviews.author: Darryl W. Ivins

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Have some bubbles weeks later. But that could be my technique.
customer_reviews.author: RayzOfMoonlight

customer_reviews.title: I would not recommend this screen
customer_reviews.text: I would not recommend this screen. The shield comes protected between 2 sheets of plastic but taking them off is a problem. The top facing side was covered in adhesive sticking it to the shield. While trying to remove the cover I had to use a lot of force to get it off. This ended up damaging the shield and made it useless. The way they package the shield is the problem.
customer_reviews.author: K5 Owner

customer_reviews.title: Not Good
customer_reviews.text: I usually love Zagg products, this way way off the mark, go elsewhere for a good screen protector, this one won't install properly.
customer_reviews.author: Robert J. Carinci

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: the invisible shield high definition for Apple Ipad Air was a little too big for Ipad air.
customer_reviews.author: javed m malik

customer_reviews.title: Shield
customer_reviews.text: This did not work well had to throw out $39.00 would not purchase again. Have verizn put on another shield.
customer_reviews.author: Jerryc7231

customer_reviews.title: Piece of garbage
customer_reviews.text: Not what I wanted. Super hard to apply. Wish I'd get my money back.
customer_reviews.author: BrandonND

customer_reviews.title: HD Invisible Shield for Ipad Air
customer_reviews.text: I do not like the way this product fits on my Ipad Air. I emailed Zagg to let them know I am disappointed in their product. It goes way over the edge of my Ipad Air and does not fit properly. I would not recommend getting this product. Maybe it fits other Ipads correctly, but not the HD Invisible shield that I received for an Ipad Air.
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: Imperfections
customer_reviews.text: Distracting rainbow effect is still present (about 3 weeks after installation). Not the quality I expected at this price point.
customer_reviews.author: Ted Chen

customer_reviews.title: Worst Protector I have Ever TRIED to Install!
customer_reviews.text: This Zagg screen protector is the pits. I have put on these protectors for ALL of my ipads, ipods, smart phones, and this one would not install properly! The instructions were as clear as mud! I heard from the Best Buy people when I first got my Ipad Air, that they couldn't sell me the cover because they had been recalled...I wonder if this is part of that batch??? I am going to have someone else install this locally. Normally all I would ever buy is Zagg...What a drag!
customer_reviews.author: Sheri Griffin

product_meta.title: InvisibleShield HDAPPIPAD5S ZAGG HD Screen Protector for Apple iPad Air / iPad Air 2- Wet Apply
product_meta.description: Exceptionally clear, unbelievably thin, and virtually indestructible, the invisible Shield High Definition offers advanced clarity and a glass-like surface to accentuate the sharp images and vibrant colors in the most advanced gadget displays. The invisible Shield High Definition is created from a film exclusive to ZAGG, and with thousands of original designs, the invisible Shield is the perfect choice for protecting any device.
feature_bullets: 100% Clear: Independent light transmission tests show the invisible Shield High Definition is 100% clear, the same as having no Shield at all
Dry Installation: It offers a unique, mess-free application
Lifetime Replacement Warranty: If the High Definition is ever damaged, ZAGG will replace it
Military Grade: It was created from a resilient film that was first used to protect U.S. Military helicopter blades
Nano-Memory Technology: Features unique properties to provide self-healing and unrivaled abrasion resistance

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.7 out of 5 stars148 ratings3.7 out of 5 stars
specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
